data.title: THAT TIME I GOT RECINCARNATED AS A SLIME ISEKAI CHRONICLES releases today on consoles and PC
data.meta_description: Bandai Namco Europe announces today the release of That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime ISEKAI Chronicles, the first console and PC game of the Tensura series.
data.text:
Bandai Namco Europe announces today the release of That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime ISEKAI Chronicles, the first console and PC game of the Tensura series.

This action RPG is available now on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch and PC.

buy now!

Based on the That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime light novel and anime adaptation, That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime ISEKAI Chronicles offers players to relive iconic moments of the original story as well as an entirely new one, featuring new characters created under the supervision of the original author Fuse.

Players will build the Jura Tempest Federation, welcoming new allies in their capital each with their side quests.

While exploring the world, the 2D side scrolling action kicks in, allowing for dynamic combos in battles with powerful enemies.

Players will be able to use each character’s special moves as seen in the animated series and each encounter will award new elements that will contribute to upgrading buildings, strengthening bonds with friends living around town.

A season pass is available for standalone purchase as well as part of the Digital Deluxe Edition, adding 3 DLCs:

DLC 1: “A Strange Fate” – Adding Hinata (29th August)

DLC 2: “The Fairy Queen’s Labyrinth” – Adding Veldora (12th September)

DLC 3: “Martial Arts Tournament” – Adding Milim (19th September)

Each DLC adds a new character, scenario or mode, buildings for the town and side quests to extend the player’s adventure.

That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime ISEKAI Chronicles is now available for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch and PC.

buy now!
